TopicTitle: How many sites do you have?

Articles.Content:
How many flag marked sites do you have?

I have 3, two on the Mun and one on Duna

My sites are

Kaos Basin: Site of my first munar landing.

Kellorf Landing: Site of the first munar landing to carry a rover with it.

Three Brothers Landing: Site of the first landing on Duna. Named after the 3 orange suited brothers who landed there.

just one on a mun arch.

Archie: To commemorate the time i totally landed here and the mun swallowed my rover.

just one on a mun arch.

Archie: To commemorate the time i totally landed here and the mun swallowed my rover.

Gotta hate when the Mun gets hungry... Exact same thing happened to my friend yesterday

2 at the moment from my first Mun-Landing ...

the first one at Mare quietatis where the lander touched down

and the second in Travellers crater, which was the farthest point that Jeb travelled away from the ship

(7.5 km ... unfortunately the way back was more uphill, so that Jeb, despite still having 60% fuel in his backpack, was forced to land 2.5 km away from the ship and travel the rest of the way on foot ... shouldnÃ‚Â´t happen with my next mission ... thanks to the new single seat I was able to make a manned rover that is small enough to be attached to the underside of my landers )

1 on my first Mun landing site (of this version).

1 on the second Mun landing site (of this version).

1 next to the Neil Armstrong Memorial anomaly. (>see GIF)

3 on the moon, One's KerbX, one is "Craft" (A cheese brand, they made a bad investment with that rocket, thinking the moon was made of cheese.), and the other is the United Kerbal Federation.

So far i haven't made a manned landing in .20 on any other planet. I'm kinda 'roleplaying' with KSP, you know making random companies to fly into space.
I went to both the mun and minnimus in one trip and forgot to put a flag on both of them dang it! now I have to do the missions again.
